titleStmt.title: The plague of Athens which hapned in the second year of the Peloponnesian Warr / first described in Greek by Thucydides, then in Latin by Lucretius, now attempted in English by Tho. Sprat.

Thucydides.
Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.
